# crawler-chromeless
A chromeless crawler for coursera

## Screenshots

![CLI-output.png](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vaenow/crawler-chromeless/master/screenshots/CLI-output.png)

## Run

```bash
$ npm i

$ node index.js

```
